/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly on the left side of the image. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. In the distance, buildings and construction cranes can be seen, indicating ongoing development in the area. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and scale to the scene.
